Package io.github.goodees.ese.immutables

Support for events based on Immutables and their JSON serialization.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ImmutableEvent
    Base class for entity events using Immutables library.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ImmutableEventTypeResolver
    Automatic JSON event type names and their instantiation for ImmutableEvent descendants.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    ImmutablesSupport
    Recommended style for immutables-based events and snapshots.

Package io.github.goodees.ese.immutables Description

Support for events based on Immutables and their JSON serialization.

How to use

  • Define all your entity's events in single package. It's package should be annotated with ImmutablesSupport in package-info.java
  • All events will inherit from base class you define in that package
  • The base class will derive from ImmutableEvent
  • Your event classes names must end with suffix Event, and should describe an event in past tense, e. g. TransactionStartedEvent
